rooms.description: Traditional Kerala design with tiled flooring and intricate woodwork, aligning the entry according to Vastu.
Spacious area for family gatherings. Designed with natural ventilation using traditional wooden jalis (lattice screens) to allow ample light and airflow.
Functional kitchen with integrated storage; positioned in a corner per Vastu principles for positive energy flow.
Master bedroom designed with ample natural light and privacy. Decorative elements influenced by Kerala traditions.
Additional bedroom maintaining similar design principles to ensure balanced energy distribution.
Third bedroom with traditional Kerala color palette and ventilation considerations.

openings.description: Traditional wooden door with carved motifs. Placed at the northeast to align with Vastu guidelines for prosperity.
Large windows with traditional design to maximize light and ventilation, aligned per Vastu.
